headline: Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) Licenses Indices to Global X for Leveraged ETFs
summary: Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) announced the licensing of its indices to Global X Investments Canada Inc. for several leveraged ETFs, potentially positioning itself in lucrative U.S. Treasury and semiconductor markets. Despite these developments, ICE’s shares dipped 2% last week. This drop contrasts with the broader market's upward trajectory, wherein the S&P 500 rose by 0.4% and Nasdaq by 1% due to tech rally, emphasizing the muted reaction of ICE's stock to its corporate announcements amid...

headline: Global X Selects ICE Indices for Four New ETFs in Canada
summary: ATLANTA & NEW YORK & TORONTO, September 03, 2025--Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. (NYSE: ICE), a leading global provider of technology and data, today announced that ICE indices have been licensed by Global X Investments Canada Inc. ("Global X") for four BetaPro ETFs. The ETFs provide three times (300%) and inverse three times (-300%) daily exposure to the performance of key U.S. market segments ranging from semiconductors to U.S. treasuries.
